season_window.notes: Chris Lemonis reshaping roster through portal after 2024 regional exit.

ballpark.name: Dudy Noble Field
ballpark.recent_upgrades: Added new sports science wing to Palmeiro Center (Sept 2024).

head_coach.name: Chris Lemonis
head_coach.staff_tenure: Seventh season in Starkville; 2021 national champion.
head_coach.playing_style: Power arms and physical bats; seeks more defensive consistency.

nil_operations.recent_initiatives: Launching Dudy Noble rooftop events for baseball donors fall 2024.

historical_context.program_trend: Trending upward again after back-to-back down years; portal reliance remains high.

intel_notes.summary: Local beat says bullpen hierarchy still unsettled; staff exploring sidearm specialist from Southland Conference.
intel_notes.source_hint: Starkville Daily News fall scrimmage recap

data_quality.next_actions: Confirm NIL contact title for Bulldog Initiative; gather roster attrition list.
